text: So a colleague created this custom module that shares popular blog posts. I cloned the module in order to make it an email friendly module and linked a stylesheet to it, but the module doesn't seem to be reading the linked styles. Any idea why that might be. I'm very new at this. Thanks!

<@UHVF0DLR5> Email modules don’t support linked stylesheets - because you can’t link stylesheets in most email clients, it’s a security issue.
It’s likely an accident(bug) the linked files section is showing at all in that module if you have that module set as an email module
